extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Route

        public Route(java.lang.String completeAddressFrom,
             java.lang.String completeAddressTo,
             java.lang.Boolean alternateRoute)
      throws javassist.tools.rmi.ObjectNotFoundException,
             java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException,
             java.io.IOException
        \brief Constructor for a Route object: constructs and determines routes (main and alternate) and calculates directions
        Parameters:
        completeAddressFrom - the complete address of the end point beginning of the route
        completeAddressTo - the complete address of the end point of the route
        alternateRoute - a boolean telling if the route calculated is the main or the alternate one
        Throws:
        javassist.tools.rmi.ObjectNotFoundException
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        java.io.IOException

      • setAlternateRouteSelected

        public void setAlternateRouteSelected(java.lang.Boolean alternateRouteSelected)
        \brief sets the route chosen
        Parameters:
        alternateRouteSelected - if true, the alternate route has been selected. Otherwise, the main has been selected.

      • determineNearestResponders

        public static Responder[] determineNearestResponders(EmergencyRecord record)
                                              throws javassist.tools.rmi.ObjectNotFoundException,
                                                     java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException,
                                                     java.io.IOException
        \brief Determines the nearest emergency responder according to the type of the emergency
        Parameters:
        record - the emergency record currently being created

        Determines an emergency responder according to the type of the emergency. Queries places from google, selects the nearest place, queries information about this place, and formats information according to a Responder. Creates a new Responder and returns it.

        Returns:
        an emergency Responder
        Throws:
        javassist.tools.rmi.ObjectNotFoundException
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        java.io.IOException

      • determineRespondersType

        private static java.lang.String determineRespondersType(Category emergencyCategory)
        Returns a string containing the query to run for a responder, according to its type
        Parameters:
        emergencyCategory - the category of the emergency
        Returns:
        the search query to query for the type of responder

      • createHTMLRoute

        private java.io.File createHTMLRoute(java.lang.String HTMLRequest,
                                     java.lang.String filename)
        \brief Creates an HTML file containing the components required to display the map retrieved by the request in HTMHRequest. Saves it in "filename"
        Parameters:
        HTMLRequest - the URL of the request to include in the HTML file
        filename - the name of the file to create
        Returns:
        a File object containing the HTML file created using the request
